text: Truttemer-le-Grand is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Vire-Normandie.Arrêté préfectoral 31 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Truttemer-le-Grand
